# THIS IS A COMMENT LINE. CHARACTER '#' MUST BE THE FIRST
# CHARACTER OF A COMMENT LINE

# Input values are as following:
# ActiveXPosition Type SubType YPosition

# ActiveXPosition: 	position where trigger happens
# Type: 		which type of entity is created
# SubType: 		more accurate subtype of the entity
# YPosition: 		spawning altitude
